name: Boomeraxe (itch)
description:
Boomeraxe is a speedrunning game where you play as a lumberjack with an axe. Run, dash, jump, and teleport your way through the level as efficiently as you can, trying to get the fastest time possible!

Boomeraxe doesn't have multiple levels, just a single one. Players can practice this level to get better and better, getting higher ranks with each run.

Good reasons to play
  • Completely free.
  • Not that bad graphics, and pretty good music.
  • I spent way too much time on this.
  • You probably already like videogames, and this is definitely a videogame.
  • I will have a reason to live if people are like "hey, that's a nice cool game my guy".

For the, like, 6 people who are interested in how this game was made, I wrote a few paragraphs over at /r/gamemaker about my journey, which you can view here.

If you can beat my personal best, which is also the global best, you are really cool.

Big Testimonies

"Aggravatingly hard but addictive" - Friend

"Yeah it's okay I guess" - Friend
